post:
Why bother with a myriad of confusing hosting plans to choose from. We offer hosting plans on the basis of how many sites you need to host, not some arbitrary values of things like disk space quota, bandwidth, etc.

Unlimited Windows and Linux Plans

Host 1 one site - $2.95/mo
Host 3 sites - $3.95/mo
Host unlimited sites - $4.95/mo

Unlimited means: No quota limits on....
Disk Space
Data Transfer
MS SQL, MySQL
Email Accounts
FTP Accounts

Don't forget to read our Unlimited FAQ and learn the truth about unlimited hosting and how we dumped the quota system!

30-day no questions asked money back guarantee.
